boat.full_description:
Hand built by Euan Seel (Suffolk). 

This is an immaculate boat, only two owners from new “1992”.

Dry stored every winter and maintained to an extremely high standard.

Cabin, two berth, toilet, cooker, sink, chartable and storage cupboards.

Two covers, one of which covers the whole boom and cockpit.

Sails all immaculate x 3.

Yanmar GM10 – inboard engine.

Wood spars and bow sprit.

See boat review by Akin and Co

THE PICTURE PERFECT POCKET CRUISER? (mysticseaport.org)
boat.name: Robelia
boat.short_description: American desined - hand built in Suffolk in 1992
